attributes.action: DO THE RIGHT THING NOW AND CALL AN ELECTION
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
it is now time for gordon brown to do the right thing and go to the country and call an election, we have lost all confidence in this goverment full stop !!  
make no wonder the country has gone belly up, they have milked it dry with there expences and second homes, if i have to work away from home, i have to to stay in a bed and breakfast, we pay your wages to do what is best for us, not rob the country blind and then try and justify it by saying we are within the rules, you made the rules in your favour !! it's wrong  !! it's a disgrace !! and you have been caught, 
so please!  do the right thing and call an election..
Kevin Oldroyd

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
